about_the_game:
Anomaly Echoes is a "walk simulator" style game that takes inspiration from the Japanese school environment, featuring liminal spaces and back rooms. The player finds himself trapped in an endless scenario of a Japanese school.


The goal is to complete all the letters before the puppet on the gallows is fully formed. If the figure is completed and the player makes another mistake, the game restarts, resetting the letters and the figure. Different phrases are presented at each restart of the game, containing secrets to unravel the events.





To win, the player must destroy all objects with anomalies, move towards the exit door and a new letter will be added to the hangman game on the blackboard. Failure to destroy all objects results in being unable to advance to the exit door. Completing the game requires all hangman letters to be completed and the player to reach the main door.





If all of the hangman's limbs are completed due to the player's mistakes in advancing to the exit, the hangman game will reset, restarting the puppets and words, and the player will need to start over. Destroying objects without anomalies will result in the puppet being added a limb to the gibbet on the blackboard.





To progress in the game, it is crucial to destroy objects that have anomalies. To identify them, it is essential to observe their peculiar positions and behaviors.





Meticulously detailed environments and an immersive soundtrack provide total immersion.





Experience different realities through the doors, each with its own challenges.





Dynamic environments where destruction is an active element that constantly challenges puzzle-solving skills.





The game features 100 different levels, each with a variety of anomalies. It is possible to complete the game without going through all the levels, increasing replayability and allowing the player to experience new anomalies.


The game varies from 15 to 60 minutes.

content_descriptors.notes: Specific scenes have: Objects with strange behavior, blood, macabre sounds, among others.
